title: What a shame the designer of this place couldn't get quieter airconditioners
text: Funky little hotel in a great central location on Manhattan Island but our stay was ruined by a noisy air conditioner outside our window that the staff seemed either unable or unwilling to fix for the three nights we were there.Would have been nice if they'd offered to move us to another room, but no, we even had to get the bellhop to run down the street and get ear plugs so we could sleep.Would only stay here again if the room did not have an airconditioner outside the window.There are better hotels in New York for the price.
